MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA29 postcode area of Largs. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.30pm to repair an underground cable fault in Castlepark Gardens and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05PM on Friday 05 February 2021.
